title: Verify a new user Sign up for MLB

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the Mytickets MPV URL
2. Click  on "Hamburger Menu-> Login"
3. Click on Signup
4. Input the First name, Last name, VALID email,password& confirm password and complete the sign up 
5. Verify the message "Welcome First Name Last Name"
And Your username is "Email Address" is displayed

6. Select the Hamburger menu and click on User Profile
7. Click on "Edit" icon
8. Enter the Following Details
3. Day Number
4. Mobile Number
5. Address1, Address2
6. City
7. Country (Should default to United States of America)
8.  State
9. Postal Code
10. DPU options (Check some DPU Option and uncheck some)

Click on "Update"


9. Verify in PVO DB

Select * from PVO.Patron_reg where PATRON_ID='1204077185'
Verify the Patron _reg records for Origin_Type_id=11
10. Select the hamburger menu and Logout
11. Input the email address and Password and Click on Login
12. Select the Hamburger menu and click on User Profile
13. Verify whether the DPU's updated in Step 8 are updated correctly
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The MPV My tickets MPV URL should be launched
2. The Login page should be displayed with title
Login

1. MLB.COM EMAIL
2. PASSWORD
3. Remember me Check box
4. Forgot Password?
5. Login Button
6. Sign up

3. The user should be navigated to MPV Signup page.
4. Patron sign up should be done successfully.
5. The message "Welcome First Name Last Name"
And Your username is "Email Address" is displayed
Click on "Continue" button
6. The User Profile page should be displayed
7. The Following Fields should be editable
1. Name
2. Email
3. Day Number
4. Mobile Number
5. Address1, Address2
6. City
7. Country (Should default to United States of America)
8.  State
9. Postal Code
10. DPU options ( If configured)

8. The Details should be updated as expected
--- "updateaccountinfo" API's are sent----
9. Both the updated password should be same in DB
10. The user should be navigated back to MLB login page
11. The user should be taken to DAC  (Digital Access Card)Page with barcode and nearest game tickets
12. The User Profile page should be displayed (All the details entered from Step 8) should be displayed correctly
13. The DPU's updated in Step 8 should be displayed as expected

title: Editing a Payment Method from My Account
custom_preconds:
1. The patron email should have associated with multiple accounts
2. AFP Permission - Default sales flow_Section sale
3.The supplier should be configured with multiple org (Main Org & Parking Org) for primary sales and the parking event should be associated with main event
4.The patron should have atleast 2 cards in the wallet.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the MPV Mytickets link
2. Give valid email and password and Login
3. Click on Buy Tickets from the Menu
4. Select the Event list for the Main org
5. Click on one active event (Inactive events will also will be there with message)
6. Verify the Default flow type is Section flow and verify the section information is displayed in the page
7. Click on Any of the section
Verify whether the buyer type drop down is displayed
8. Click on "Add to Cart" button
9. Verify the Default delivery method is selected - Tickets@Home
10. Verify that the default card is selected as default Payment method
11. Select Buy Tickets from hamburger menu for the parking org
12. Add one active parking event to the cart page selecting the seats from Best available section.(Note - After 3259 fix, we cant see Add to cart button for best available section in mobile devices)
13. Verify the Default delivery method is selected
14. Click on  ">" corresponding to to "Delivery Method"

15. Select the Delivery Method "Tickets@Home"
Verify whether the First Name, Last Name and Email address is populated by default
16. Select the "Change" hyperlink  Card & Click on Edit

17. Edit address details, Say change State to California and Postal code is updated to 92626
18. Verify CVC is there or input the same and complete transaction
19. Click on Go to Inventory button in confirmation page.
20. Click on "Hamburger Menu-> Payment Info"
21. Click on "Edit" icon on the card which is selected in Step 18
22. 1. Change the expiration date to Future
2. Change the Card Nickname
3. Change the First Name, Last Name
4. Select "Set as Default"
5. Change the Billing information (Street Address, City, State and Postal Code)
6. Click on "Update Card"

23. Go to Menu and click on logout
24. Click on "Hamburger Menu-> Payment Info"
25. Click on "Edit" icon on the card which is selected in Step 23
26. Verify all the details updated in Step 23 are reflected
27. Click on "Remove Card" button
28. Go to Menu and click on logout
29. Click on "Hamburger Menu-> Payment Info"
30. Verify that removed card is no longer visible
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV Mytickets link should be launched succesfully and user should be navigated to Login page
2. The user should be landed on Mytickets dashboard where we see the View Tickets & event details of nearest future and View inventory button

-Verify Enter venue,Login APis--
3. Buy Tickets main menu item should be expanded and different org event list sub menu items should be displayed.


4. The user should be landed on the Main org event list page

-Verify the event schedule APi--
5. The user should be navigated to event availability page.

-Verify the getavailability APi--
6. The User should be navigated to Section flow availability page.
7. The buyer type drop down should be displayed as expected with default number of tickets selected in the drop down
8. The seat should be locked and the user should be navigated to the Shopping cart page

-Verify the Lockseats APis-
9. The default delivery method should be selected
10. The default card should be selected as default Payment method
11. The user should be able to navigate to the parking org event list
12. Event should be added to the cart
13. The Default delivery method should not be selected and should be empty
14. The user should be navigated to "Select your shipping Page"
15. First Name, Last Name and Email address is populated by default
Click on "Continue" button
16. The user should be navigated to Edit card page
17. The Card details should be filled and saved while clicking on Save card option
18. -CVC should be given
- The transaction should be completed succesfully.
- Checkout API should be verified.
-Verify the Order details are recorded in tdc_order, PVO_payment tables and PV,MTD etc.


19. The user should be navigated to MPV Mytixx home page
20. The Payment info page is displayed
21. The Edit Payment Method should be displayed
22. The details should be updated as expected and a message "The card has been updated" should be displayed
---Persist Digital Wallet API---
23. The user should be able to Log out and navigated to MPV Login page.
24. The Payment info page is displayed
25. The Edit Payment Method should be displayed
26. All the card details from step 23 should be displayed as expected
27. The Card should be removed as expected
28. The user should be able to Log out and navigated to MPV Login page.
29. The Payment info page is displayed
30. The removed call should no longer be visible

title: Verify the 'Remember me' Functionality after completing Single sales
custom_preconds:
1. The patron email should have associated with multiple accounts
2. AFP Permission - Default sales flow_Section sale
3.Note down the DPU settings of the patron in PV (Make one DPU level channel values null)
4.The patron should have atleast 2 cards in the wallet.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the MPV Mytickets link
2. Give valid email and password and Login checking the Remember me Checkbox
3. Click on Login
4. Click on Buy Tickets from the Menu
5. Select the Event list for the Main org
6. Click on one active event (Inactive events will also will be there with message)
7. Verify the Default flow type is Section flow and verify the accordion is opened for sections other than the Best available
8. Switch to Seatmap flow (For automation we can continue with the section flow) & Select GA/SRO Seats
9. Verify the Default delivery method is selected - Go to delivery details and update with other information -Say if the email is given test@abc.com previously change the same to some other value.
10. Click on the Payment method available in Payment page
11. Update the Changes
12. Navigate hamburger menu -> My account->payment method and verify the updated changes are reflected in payment page,
13. Change the Card name on the card and update
14. Remove the 2nd card in the wallet other than the above
15. Now Navigate back to Cart page and go to 'Select payment method'
16. Select the card and navigate to the cart page.
17. Give CVC and verify the DPUs displayed in the cart page & Complete transaction.
18. Click on Go to Inventory button in confirmation page.
19. Verify the View Tickets button is present in the Dash board and the event information& Ticket count should be displayed with button.
20. Click on the View Tickets button
21. Go back to Dash board
Click on View Tickets inventory
Verify the user is navigated to the Event list where we should be able to see the month drop down value is event month and in event panel , the no of seat count should be displayed.
22. Go to Menu and click on logout
23. Verify the User name is auto filled and non editable and the Digital access card for the patron is displayed
24. Uncheck the Remember me checkbox & Login as the same user and pass word
25. Logout from the hamburger menu
26. Verify the confirmation email received in patron's email id with order details.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV Mytickets link should be launched succesfully and user should be navigated to Login page
2. The user name field should not be disabled and user should be able to enter another email address if needed
3. The user should be landed on Mytickets dashboard where we see the View Tickets & event details of nearest future and View inventory button

-Verify Enter venue,Login APis--
4. Buy Tickets main menu item should be expanded and different org event list sub menu items should be displayed.


5. The user should be landed on the Main org event list page

-Verify the event schedule APi--
6. The user should be navigated to event availability page.

-Verify the getavailability APi--
7. The User should be navigated to Section flow availability page.
8. The seat should be locked and the user should be navigated to the Shopping cart page

-Verify the Lockseats APis-
9. Verify the Delivery details can be updated and on updation, the user is able to navigate back to cart page 
10. The user should be navigated to Select payment page and the edit button should be available in the payemnet page
11. On updation, the user is able to navigate back to cart page.

- Verify the Persist DW API--
12. The Updated details should be reflected in Payment method page.
13. The card details should be updated.

-Verify the Persist DW API--
14. The card details should be removed.


-Verify the Persist DW API--
15. in The payment method page, the removed card should not be displayed and the card one which is updated in payment method should reflect the details.
16. The user should be able to navigate back to cart page.
17. CVC should be given and there should be only one DPU channel present for all the active contact options returned from PV as per the pre-requisites & transaction should be completed succesfully
18. The user should be navigated to MPV Mytixx home page
19. The Dashboard elements - View Tickets,View Inventory should be displayed as expected.
20. The User should be navigated to the Ticket list

-Verify gettickets API-
21. The event list tab display should be as expected when the user navigates to Event list page.
22. The user should be able to Log oue and navigated to MPV Login page.
23. User name should auto filled and non editable and the Digital access card for the patron is displayed on logout
24. The user should be navigated to MyTickets Dashboard
25. The user details and Digital access card should not be present in the MPV Login page.
26. Confirmation email received in patron's email id should have valid and accurate order details.

title: Verify that user is able to complete transaction with coupon protected buyer type and normal buyer type in accessible seating flow, when Show only coupon eligible areas is unchecked
Verify the error message  for BTQR,Min/Max,SQF & Ticket Quota in MPV Single sales
custom_preconds:
1. Have 2 Buyer Types say A & B in PV
2.Define BTQR relation ships between them in Buyer types (Say A requires exactly one B) where A and B are dependent buyer types
3.Assign Price scale min/max limit is from 3- 7
4.Associate Event Quota for an Event - 7 & the External sell  by type defined as - Sell by Price scale
5.Associate a Promotion for Buyer B with SQF - 2

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the MPV Mytickets link
2. Login as the User with valid email and password
3. Click on Buy Tickets
4. Select an active event
5. Now Select the price scale where we defined the min/max limit
6. Select 2 Tickets for Buyer type A  & Add to cart
7. Select 3 Seats for Buyer A & Add to cart
8. Return to the Same price scale
9. Now apply the coupon (EX:COUPON) 
10. Now Select 3 from both A and B 
11. Now Select 8 for both A and B Buyer type
12. Lock 6 seats for Buyer B 
13. Cancel the order and click on Yes in the popup modal (Approving order cancellation)
14. Select another event and complete the single sales
15. Verify the purchased tickets are active in Patron inventory
16. Logout the session
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV Mytickets link should be launched succesfully
2. The user should be navigated to MPV dashboard
3. The User should be navigated to the event list
4. The user should be navigated to event availability page
5. The price scale should be selected
6. Verify the user is displayed with the Price scale Min violation error
7. BTQR error should be displayed after login
8. The user should be able to return
9. Buyer B should be displayed with coupon applied message
10. Now we should get SQF error for Buyer B for selecting the seats of multiples of 2
11. Now user should be displayed with Maximum Ticket  error
12. User should be navigated to shopping cart page
13. From the Gear button the user should be selected the cancel order  button and user should be navigated back to event list page
14. The user should be able to complete the transaction and the Order details should be there in DB & PV.
15. The Tickets should be active in Patron inventory
16. The user should be able to logout and navigate back to login page.

1. The supplier should have MPV configuration for single organization (ie, while clicks on Buy Tickets, the supplier should be able to navigate the event list under parent org)
2. Default sales type in AFP Sales Permission should be Map sales (Note: It can be tested with Best available in Automation test if planning to do)
3.Note down the Default DPU settings in PV for the organization
4.Payment plan should not be associared with the Event

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the MPV Mytickets Link
2. Select Sign up button
3. Provide all the information but violate the password format specified in the instruction
4. Now give password with the specification but don't give confirm password and Click on Signup
5. Give the confirm password mismatches with the password field entry and Click on Signup
6. Now give the confirm password as same the password and clicks on submit
7. Check the Terms and conditions checkbox 
8. Click on Continue
9. Click on View Inventory button
10. Click on the Hamburger menu displayed at the top left corner
11. Click on Buy Tickets
12. Verify the Event list has both active & inactive event and apply filter for 2018 April- 2018 Dec events from the list
13. Select active event
14. Select Section from Section map/Seat map other than from Best available and choose the comp buyer types ($0
) from accordion/minicart opened.
15. Click on Add to cart & Verify there is no Payment method tab
16. Change the default Delivery method to a delivery method which require address 
17. Enter the Address details and click on continue
18. Verify the Cart icon at the top of the page 
19. Click on the Gear button in the event panel displayed
20. Select Replace Tickets
21. Select non- comp buyertype (>$0)
22. Verify the delivery method panel
23. Change the default Delivery method to a delivery method which require address and click on continue
24. Verify the DPU settings matches with the PV settings & GDPR check box should be unchecked
25. Add a New Card -

-  Card Number,Type,Address Details, Name on card etc
26. Check on" Save to Future use" checkbox
27. Do not change DPU settings and complete transaction after giving CVC code
28. Verify the Order details are recorded in tdc_order, PVO_payment tables and PV etc.
29. Click on Go to Inventory button in confirmation page.
30. Verify the View Tickets button is present in the Dash board and the event information& Ticket count should be displayed with button.
31. Click on the View Tickets button
32. Go back to Dash board
33. Verify the user is navigated to the Event list where we should be able to see the month drop down value is event month and in event panel , the no of seat count should be displayed.
34. Go to Menu and click on logout
35. Login again with the patron credentials
36. Go to My account-user profile 
37. Logout & re-login then Verify the payment info
38. Verify the confirmation email received in patron's email id with order details.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV my tickets link should be launched successfully and the user should be landed on Login page.
2. The user should be navigated to Sign up page where the First name,Last name,email,password/confirm password fields should be displayed.
3. The error message should be displayed for the field - Invalid Password
4. The page should be displayed the error message - Please complete all required field message at the top of the page and field validation message - Enter confirm password at the below of the confirm password field.
5. The page should be displayed the error message - Please complete all required field message at the top of the page and field validation message - Password does not match at the below of the password & confirm password field.
6. Here user should be displayed with error indicting" agree the terms and conditions"



7. Now the patron will be navigated to the welcome page & with the message displayed our name - email ID that we gave in signup form
8. The user is navigated to MPV mytickets home page (Dashboard) with "View Inventory" button displayed below
9. The user should be navigated to the patron inventory - Message- You have no inventory.(Shown under ALL /month drop down)

10. The user should be displayed with menu items - Buy Tickets,Buy Replay Tickets,My account,FAQ,My Account,Logout ,Debug (Optional)
11. Verify the user is navigated to Event list page


12. The Event list inactive events should be marked with proper error message like - This event is not currently on sale & Selected filter should be reflect the change in MPV Event list as well.
13. The user should be navigated to Event availability page.There the user is able to see the Filter, Accessible seating consent check box,No of Tickets drop down etc.

Note - Sections will be displayed with Section codes,Row info and price information if Default sales type in AFP Sales Permission set to 'Best Available' and seat map only if Default sales type in AFP Sales Permission set to 'Map sales' in PV.

14. The buyer type should be selected from the section accordion- for section/mini cart- for Seat map 
15. Verify the user is navigated to shopping cart page. Payment method tab should not be there in the cart.


16. Change Delivery details page should be displayed 
17. Shopping cart page should be displayed with the selected delivery
18. The cart icon should be displayed with the number to tickets locked 

19. The panel should be opened with Add Tickets,Replace Tickets,Cancel order,remove options.
20. The user should be navigated back to availability (Based on default value set - Choose section flow for Automation)
21. The buyer should be added to cart
22. The delivery method displayed will again be the default one
23. Shopping cart page should be displayed with the selected delivery
24. The DPU settings should be matched with the PV settings
25. All the Card details should be served as input
26. The "Save to future use" checkbox should be checked & Save changes
27. -CVC should be given
- The transaction should be completed succesfully.

28. PV:
Check the Ticker services and verify the transaction & Payment and delivery details Tab.
In DPU Settings , make sure the DPU option value should be "Not Set"

Database to be verified:
Verify the Data bases:


-	select * from pvo.payment where order_id = 2716349040 (Verify the Total amount, Payment code and Payment subagency)
-	select * from pvo.offer where order_id = 2716349040 (Verify the Order ID & details)
-	select * from pvo.offer_seat where order_id = 2716349040 (verify the entry with the order ID and Status Code)
-	select * from pvo.offer_payment where order_id = 2716349040
-	select * from pvo.fee where order_id = 2716349040
-	select * from pvo.tdc_order where order_id = 2716349040 
-	Select * from pvo.patron_info where patron_id=1204197104
-	select * from PVO.patron_reg where patron_id = 1204078006
-	Select * from PVO.sub_agency_patron  where patron_id = 1204078009
-	Select * from PVO.offer_disposition where order_id= (Verify which delivery method is selected currently)


29. The user should be navigated to MPV Mytixx home page
30. The Dashboard elements - View Tickets,View Inventory should be displayed as expected.
31. The User should be navigated to the Ticket list


32. Click on View Tickets inventory
33. The event list tab display should be as expected when the user navigates to Event list page.
34. The user should be able to Log out and navigated to MPV Login page.
35. My tixx home page will be displayed 
36. -Address given on Delivery Details should be updated as user profile
-DPU setting given on cart page should be reflected & GDPR check box should be un checked
37. The card added in the previous login should be displayed
38. Confirmation email received in patron's email id should have valid and accurate order details.

title: Verify TicketSaleForADAIncludingAddReplaceRemoveCancelTicket
custom_preconds:
The patron email should have associated with multiple accounts & Valid card details
AFP Permission - Default sales flow_Section sale 3.Create an event with ADA setup and perf accept the same to MPV single sales supplier 4.Make sure that the ADA having ESD assigned with additional seat details

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the MPV Mytickets link
2. Login as the patron in the pre-requisites but with invalid email ID and Login
3. Give valid email and password and Login
4. Click on Buy Tickets from the Menu
5. Select the Event list for the Main org
6. Click on the event mentioned in pre-requisite.
7. Verify the Default flow type is Section flow and verify the accordion is opened for sections other than the Best available
8. Switch to Accessible seats flow.
9. Confirm the pop up.
Verify that all the available section which has accessible seating is filtered out.
10. Select an available section which have ADA seats and add seats to cart.
11. Verify the Additional seat details has been returned in the cart
12. Verify the Default delivery method is selected - Verify that the default delivery method is Tickets@Home
13. Click on ADD TICKETS from ticket action 
14. Switch to ADA flow by selecting the accessible checkbox from the filter 
15. Select seat/seats and continue to existing cart by clicking on Add to cart button
16. Verify the seats details in cart page after adding more seats
17. Verify the delivery details are not returned after adding more seats in to cart
18. Replace tickets :
Select Replace tickets action from second event
19. Click on Continue to replace tickets and navigate to availability
20. Switch to ADA from availability by using accessible option 
Continue to switch (from the option that user will gt while opting ADA switch)
21. Select seats and add seats to cart using Add to cart button
22. Verify the new seats added in to cart page
23. Remove offer : 
Click on Remove tickets from ticket action  (for replaced seats)
Click on Continue option from confirmation popup
24. Cancel order : 
Click on Cancel order option from ticket actions
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV Mytickets link should be launched succesfully and user should be navigated to Login page
2. Invalid email ID error should be displayed
3. The user should be landed on Mytickets dashboard where we see the View Tickets & event details of nearest future and View inventory button

-Verify Enter venue,Login APis--
4. Buy Tickets main menu item should be expanded and different org event list sub menu items should be displayed.
5. The user should be landed on the Main org event list page

-Verify the event schedule APi--
6. The user should be navigated to event availability page.

-Verify the getavailability APi--
7. The User should be navigated to Section flow availability page.
8. Accessible seats pop up confirmation message is shown to user.
9. Sections with Accessible seating is filtered out
10. ADA seats are successfully added to cart.

-Verify the LockSeats API--
11. Additional seat details should be returned in the cart page
12. Tickets@Home should be displayed as expected
13. User should be navigated to the availability page of the same event
14. User should be able to select the accessible checkbox
Application should prompt a confirmation popup  and user should be navigated to ADA availability flow once use selects continue button
15. User should be navigated to Shopping cart page with new additional seats
16. Shopping cart page should have both seat details
17. Delivery details should not be returned in the cart page after adding more seats in to cart
User should have option to select delivery from cart page
18. User should get a confirmation popup

19. User should be navigated to availability page
20. user should be navigated to ADA availability after switching to ADA flow
21. User should be able to add seats to cart using add to cart button
22. existing seats should get replaced by new seats
23. Newly added seats should get removed from cart page
24. Order should be cancelled and user should be navigated to Event Schedule page

title: Complete ADA+non ADA Seats transaction
custom_preconds:
1. Have an Event with ADA configuration
2.Event Buyer type should associated with a discount promotion
3. Masterpass External permission should be Optional for the event.
4.Have a Supplier configured for Single/Multiple orgs in Primary sales
5.Default sales flow (AFP_Sales permission) should be Best Available.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the MPV Mytickets Link
2. Click on Signup
3. Provide all the details and complete the Signup transaction
4. Click on Continue
5. Click on Buy Tickets from Hamburger menu
6. Select Active event
7. Verify the Section flow is displayed and the Accessible seating consent Check box should be unchecked
8. Click on Accessible seat checkbox
9. Verify the confirmation popup opened for switching from non ADA to ADA Seats & Click on Yes
10. Apply coupon code
11. Select the Checkbox for exclusiveness of coupon functionality (SHOW ONLY EXCLUSIVE COUPONS)
12. Select the Coupon Protected buyers and lock seats
13. Click on gear button
14. Click on Add tickets
15. Switch back to non ADA seat by unchecking accessible seating checkbox
16. Select seat and Lock the seats
17. Add the Delivery method Information
18. Add Payment details   (For Manual testing, We should add Masterpass card and complete the transaction)
19. Verify the Payment method added in account page from Hamburger menu

20. Navigate back to Cart page
21. Change the Delivery to some other delivery method and Give CVC code
22. Complete transaction
23. Navigate to Mytickets from the menu - MY Tickets
24. Verify the tickets in Patron Inventory
25. Select the Tickets and Put for Replay
26. Logout and Navigate to B2C Page
27. Click on the event
28. Continue to Shopping cart page & Complete the transaction
29. Verify the confirmation email received in patron's email id with order details.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The user should be landed on the MPV Login page
2. The User should be navigated to Signup forum
3. The Signup transaction should be done successful manner
4. The User should be navigated to the MPV home page/Dashboard
5. The user should be able to select and Navigate the event list of selected org from Menu
6. The user should be navigated to Event availability
7. The Accessible seating should be unchecked (ie, currently we have non ADA Seats.
8. The Accessible seating checkbox should be checked
9. Now the Seating should be changed from non ADA to ADA
10. The coupon code should be applied
11. The Exclusive coupon protected buyers should be displayed as expected.
12. The user should be navigated to the cart page
13. Verify the Add tickets option is there in the opened list
14. The user should be navigated to the availability page.
15. The seats displayed are non ADA Seats
16. The user should be navigated to cart page.
17. The delivery method information should be updated without checking SAVE ACCOUNT INFORMATION
18. The Payment information should be updated and navigate back to cart page.
19. The details of added Payment card should be updated in Payment method (in Menu->My Account)
20. The user should be able to navigate back to Cart page
21. The User should be able to change the delivery methods by tapping - Change delivery details
22. The user should be able to complete the transaction succesfully.
- Verify the Checkout API
-Verify the Order Details in PVO & tdc order tables
-Verify the Order details are reflected in MTD and PV.

23. The user should be navigated to MPV My tickets Home page
24. The Tickets should be there in patrons Tickets inventory
25. the Tickets should be posted for Replay
26. The event with offer we created should be listed over there
27. The user should be navigated to the offer list and verify the ADA badge is displaying in the offer list page
28. The ISA symbol should be displayed a in shopping cart and the user should be able to complete the transaction.
29. Confirmation email received in patron's email id should have valid and accurate order details.

CC setting to enable Voucher is set to true
Set up few voucher event /package with voucher ticket price is higher than the target event ticket price
Configure the voucher to a source package list 
Buy few voucher tickets for the event/package
Set All-in-pricing=fals
Set Hide price flag = true for the source event

Create a service charge group with per tickets fee, transaction fee and offer fee. And display order should be 1.
Create ungrouped per tickets fee with display order 2
Create ungrouped transaction fee with display order 3 
and Create ungrouped offer fee with display order 2

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Follow steps in [C156763] to Select Voucher and reach the availability page of event in redeem flow
2. Verify the ticket price displayed in the availability page
3. Select the voucher  unlocked Buyer Type and click on add to cart
4. Verify the gear options available in Voucher cart
5. Click on replace tickets
6. Select a normal Buyer type and click on add to cart 
7. Enter CVV and complete trasnaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. User is landed on the availability page.

2. The ticket price has been displayed as PREPAID with an asterisk symbol
3. Shopping cart page will be displayed  with the voucher redeemed buyer type
4. 1. Add Tickets
2.Remove Tickets
3.Replace offer
4. Cancel Order
5. Availabity page will be displayed 
6. Shopping cart page should be displayed with the added normal buyer type  tickets
7. Transaction should be completed successfully

Total Due AMount panel:

Total Amount Due:$10.00
Where the ticket price is greater than the voucher value, the â€˜Priceâ€™ label shall be changed to â€˜Upgrade Priceâ€™ (or customized value) and the different due shall be reflected.
12. The user should able to complete the transaction.
Verify Pv and Db tables.

11. Select Forward from the Voucher Actions option
12. Verify the UI of  Forward  voucher Page when an event voucher is selected
